About Bhojan Sanjeewani Trust

Our Mission

Bhojan Sanjeewani Trust is dedicated to eradicating hunger among underprivileged children by providing nutritious meals and promoting healthy eating habits.

Our Vision

We envision a world where no child goes to bed hungry, where every child has access to nutritious food essential for their growth, development, and education.

Our Story

Founded in 2018, Bhojan Sanjeewani Trust began as a small initiative to feed street children in one locality. Today, we have expanded to multiple cities, serving thousands of meals daily to children in need.

Learn More

Our Programs

Daily Meal Program

Providing nutritious meals to children in schools, orphanages, and community centers.

Nutrition Education

Teaching children and communities about balanced diets and healthy eating habits.

Community Kitchens

Setting up community kitchens in underserved areas to provide regular meals.

Sustainable Food Gardens

Creating food gardens in schools to teach children about sustainable food sources.

Our Impact

At Bhojan Sanjeewani Trust, we believe that proper nutrition is fundamental to a child's development and future success. Our programs have shown significant improvements in:

  • School attendance and academic performance
  • Overall health and reduced malnutrition
  • Community engagement and awareness
  • Creating sustainable food solutions

Success Stories

"The daily meals provided by Bhojan Sanjeewani Trust have helped our students concentrate better in class. Attendance has improved significantly."

- Priya Sharma, School Principal

"My children look forward to the nutritious meals. It has made a huge difference in their health and energy levels."

- Ramesh Kumar, Parent

How Your Contribution Helps

Your generous donation helps us provide nutritious meals to children in need. Here's how your contribution makes a difference:

  • ₹100 can feed a child for a week
  • ₹500 can provide meals for 5 children for a week
  • ₹1000 can support a community kitchen for a day
  • ₹5000 can help establish a sustainable food garden
